CustomField.formula: ( TODAY() - DATEVALUE(Account.Account_Assignment_Date__c) <= 6 || CONTAINS( Account.Hashtag__c , "#holdover" ) || CONTAINS( Account.Hashtag__c , "#Holdover" ) || CONTAINS( Hashtag__c , "#holdover" ) || CONTAINS( Hashtag__c , "#Holdover" ) ) && ( Account.Status__c = "New" || Account.Status__c = "Assigned" || Account.Status__c = "Attempting" ) && Active_Growth_Campaigns_Count__c = 0 && ( MOD(FLOOR( (Follow_Up_Date__c - DATEVALUE("2006-01-01" ))/7),52)+1 != MOD(FLOOR( (TODAY() - DATEVALUE("2006-01-01" ))/7),52)+1 )
CustomField.label: CML Tabs: Weekly Outbound Focus
